DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate commonly use anesthetic drug propofol work brain produce loss consciousness . While general anesthesia brain wave measure use electroencephalogram ( EEG ) . On separate day , patient 's brain image use magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) .
DOC.brief_title: EEG Studies Induction Recovery From Propofol Induced General Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: Healthy , nonsmoking male female volunteer , age 1836 normal body weight .
